meanings.definition: Buprestids: a family of beetles known for their metallic coloring.
meanings.sent1: The buprestids shimmered in the sunlight, displaying their colorful bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study buprestids to learn more about their unique coloring.
meanings.sent3: The buprestids decided to have a fashion show to show off their metallic hues.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry sparkled like buprestids under the bright lights.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the glint of buprestids, like tiny jewels scattered around.

meanings.definition: Buprestids: beetles belonging to the family Buprestidae.
meanings.sent1: We observed the buprestids crawling on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The buprestids in the collection were carefully preserved for study.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous buprestids played hide-and-seek among the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a kingdom of buprestids, each beetle a noble in its own right.
meanings.sent5: The children marveled at the buprestids, their tiny bodies reflecting the light like precious gems.
